messages.title: THE REAL OPPOSITION
messages.content: HOW WOULD YOU SPEND £40 MILLION A DAY?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dr Karen Maunder believes in regaining control of UK borders to deal with issues arising from immigration.
Committed to addressing an overloaded NHS.
Wants to make affordable housing a fairer option.
Focused on tackling debt and investing in education.

issues.brexitEurope: Believes the UK should leave the EU to take back control and come out of the dictatorship of the EU.
issues.economy: Wants to tackle the national debt and ensure a fair economy.
issues.governance: Believes in change of approach to deal with mounting debt and restoring control to Britain.

housing.content: Supports the provision of affordable housing

leaflet.personalStatement: Dr Karen Maunder has a PhD in Biochemistry and has worked in Clinical Research for 17 years. She lives in Lichfield with her husband and two children.

contactInformation.address: UK Independence Party, 24 Lime Grove, Lichfield WS13 6ER

images.caption: Dr Karen Maunder, UKIP Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for Lichfield and Burntwood
